Integrate your favourite websites, CRM and online accounts package with your Vostel account.

Features include:
📞  Click to call
☎️  Dial pad with Speed Dial
📲  Inbound popup with hyperlink (configurable for CRM integration)
⛔️  Do Not Disturb (DND) with unique snooze function
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦  Ring Group Join/Leave
🆕  See What's new
🎙  Record a system greeting
📝  See a list of recent calls
